tasks.task: Operate farming machinery to plant crops.
subtasks: Insert seeds into the ground using the seed drill.
Drive the tractor pulling the seed drill.
Monitor the planting depth and speed settings on the drill.
Adjust the planting speed as needed during operation.

tasks.task: Load seeds onto the seed drill hopper.
subtasks: Lift the seed bag onto the hopper bin.
Open the seed hopper door and pour seeds in.
Check seed level in hopper regularly during planting.

tasks.task: Check and maintain the seed drill's seed distribution.
subtasks: Inspect the seed plates to ensure proper seed spacing.
Clean any clogs or obstructions in the seed drill.
Adjust the seed metering mechanism if it isn't distributing seeds evenly.

tasks.task: Prepare the field prior to planting.
subtasks: Clear the field of debris and rocks.
Disk the soil to prepare a suitable planting seedbed.
Smooth the soil surface with a harrow.

tasks.task: Align the seed drill with the previous crop row.
subtasks: Align the seed drill's wheels with the crop marks.
Check the offset adjustments on the seed drill to match existing rows.

tasks.task: Troubleshoot mechanical issues with the seed drill.
subtasks: Check hydraulic lines for leaks or damage.
Lubricate moving parts of the drill to prevent binding.
Tighten loose bolts or nuts on the drill structure.

tasks.task: Safely disengage the seed drill from the tractor.
subtasks: Lower the seed drill to the ground.
Shift gears on the tractor and seed drill to disengage.
Engage the safety brakes on the seed drill.

tasks.task: Secure the seed drill onto the tractor implements rack.
subtasks: Attach the seed drill to the tractor's drawbar.
Check connections for tightness before towing.

tasks.task: Inspect the planting vs. cutting blades.
subtasks: Verify that the blades are sharp and not chipped.
Check the tension of the blades to ensure proper operation.
Loosen the furrow opener wheel setting.
Add shims to raise or lower the seeding depth.
Turn the adjustment mechanism to raise or lower the seeding mechanism.
Verify the planting depth by observing the cutters as they close.
Test the hydraulic pump's output.
Check the hydraulic hoses for proper pressure.

tasks.task: Control the planting depth while driving the tractor.
subtasks: Apply gentle pressure on the accelerator while starting to prevent float.
Smoothly modulate the throttle to avoid bouncing the drill.

tasks.task: Ensure the seed drill is in the correct position.
subtasks: Align the seeding units with the furrow.
Check symmetrical closure of the furrows on either side.

tasks.task: Maintain the correct hydraulic fluid levels.
subtasks: Check the reservoir fluid level and add if necessary.
Monitor the hydraulic oil temperature to ensure it's within operating limits.

tasks.task: Communicate with the operator behind the tractor.
subtasks: Coordinate speed and adjustments by using hand signals or radio.
Instruct the operator to slow down or stop if necessary.

tasks.task: Prepare the seed drill for transport.
subtasks: Ensure all implements are locked properly.
Disconnect the electrical connections if needed.

tasks.task: Check the tension in the packing chain.
subtasks: Inspect the chain for wear or slipping.
Tighten or adjust the chain tension to prevent movement.

tasks.task: Prevent the furrow closers from dragging.
subtasks: Check the distance between the furrow openers and closers.
Adjust spacing if the closers are rubbing the ground.
